name: AITalentMarketplace
description: A specialized platform connecting businesses with verified AI professionals for project-based work

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: AI Talent Marketplace needs access to your camera to upload profile photos and project portfolio items.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: AI Talent Marketplace needs access to your photo library to upload portfolio items and project documents.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: AI Talent Marketplace needs permission to save images to your photo library for your portfolio.
infoPlist.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: AI Talent Marketplace uses Face ID for secure login and payment verification.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: AI Talent Marketplace uses your location to suggest nearby job opportunities.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: AI Talent Marketplace needs microphone access for video interviews and voice messages in the collaboration workspace.
